Title: Ankhi O Tar Bondhura
Writer: Muhammad Zafar Iqbal (novel), Morshedul Islam (screenplay), Barkat Ullah Maruf (screenplay)
Actors: Zahin Nawar Haque, Ananya Samael, Saberi Alam, Syed Ashiquzzaman
Plot: The film tells the story of a visually challenged girl and her friends who support her to express & enhance her talents and their adventure
